about_the_game:
The Clown's Forest: Fear of a Survivor© is a survival horror action-adventure game built in RPG Maker MZ and is a prequel to The Clown's Forest 2: Waking Shadows© (Will contain spoilers for The Clown's Forest, This game is best played after beating the first game)

STORY

Blitzo had failed to kill Michael many times. After Michael killed Carl, Blitzo was furious but realized his plans were not entirely ruined. After bringing Carl back to life, he had no recollection of what happened. Blitzo then taunted him about betraying his friends and his attempts to kill Michael.

Blitzo then invited Carl to join him in a revenge plot against Michael, to which he refused. Blitzo wasn't too surprised and promised to give Carl freedom if he could earn it. Blitzo then requests help from his friend, and fellow serial killer, Patrick. Who helps hunt down Carl.

Can Carl escape with his life and sanity intact? Or will he succumb to Blitzo's Power?

GAMEPLAY

The Clown's Forest: Fear of a Survivor© Is a top-down Survival Horror game set between the events of The Clown's Forest© and The Clown's Forest 2: Waking Shadows©, Carl has to escape the evil clutches of Blitzo and Patrick as he comes to terms with his friend's deaths.

Explore the derelict paths of Hartown Forest as you try and find your way to escape the evil killers, find items to aid your escape, or items to aid in defending yourself from your enemies. Carl will have to use his wits to survive.

For the first time ever in a Clown's Forest game, you can somewhat fight back with the new defense items! Which will allow you to escape the clutches of Blitzo and Patrick without dying!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains gore and intense violence, references to suicide, depression, and sexual abuse, as well as many other topics that could be distressing to a majority of players.

Please be cautious when playing this game.
